name: screenlite
tagline: A self-hosted digital signage management tool
description: Screenlite is a self-hosted digital signage tool that allows displaying custom media and messages on remote screens. It includes scheduling and multi-screen management.

features.title: Digital Signage
features.description: Display custom content on remote screens for advertising or information

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Schedule media playback by time, date, or recurring patterns

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Control multiple displays from a centralized dashboard

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Organize images, videos, and web content in a centralized repository

features.title: Playlist Creation
features.description: Build playlists with transitions, durations, and playback rules

features.title: Remote Control
features.description: Update content and settings on displays without physical access

features.title: Screen Monitoring
features.description: Track display status, uptime, and playback health in real-time

features.title: Layout Templates
features.description: Create split-screen layouts with multiple content zones
